response.overview: Shatekaienthokwen VanDommelen is a 10 year-old boxer from the Mohawk community of Kahnawake. He may be small, but he has big plans for the future.  His dream is to become a professional boxer — so he trains at the Hard Knox Gym in Montreal twice a week and never misses an opportunity to enter the ring. Known by the nickname “Tugar,” this rising athlete is gaining attention from coaches and pros, who all say he has the potential to make it big.  Little Hard Knox shows us how desire, passion and hard work build a champion.
response.title: Little Hard Knox
